item.description: Bats are wonderful! They eat mosquitoes by the thousands, and they give us guano, a rich fertilizer beyond compare, over which wars have been fought in the past! Bats need a place to live. Their western caves are having serious issues with the white nose disease. I will hold a workshop on making bat houses, in JP at the Egleston Community Orchard. Easy and fun! No experience necessary! Come one, come all! Free -- small $5 to $10 donation accepted gratefully if you feel the spirit of giving and abundance, but not necessary! Come to the community orchard and have some fun, and get a bat house to take home or give to someone!
item.name: Bat House Making!
